Key Match Events: Australia won by 4 wickets (with 4 balls remaining)
Tim David made his debut for Australia and scored 18 runs off 14 balls
Pre-Game Insights: Australia are expected to hand a T20I cap to Tim David, while Pant has something to prove for India
India and Australia's chance to fine tune their T20 World Cup plans
India have played a total of 29 T20Is heading into this series, while Australia have played just nine
Australia are without the injured trio of Mitchell Starc, Mitchell Marsh and Marcus Stoinis for this series, while David Warner has been rested
India are entering the series with the strongest available squad and will be looking to mainly focus on making roles clearer
Rohit Sharma said India were '90-95% settled' ahead of the T20 World Cup
Finch said there will be a lot of 'mixing and matching' ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: It is expected to be partly cloudy and humid in Mohali, with a 25% chance of precipitation in the evening
Kohli's 718 runs against Australia are the most by any player against an opposition in men's T20Is
Australia have won each of their last three T20Is in India
Jasprit Bumrah has dismissed Glenn Maxwell seven times in 15 meetings in T20s
